name: Command Manager
description: Run and manage commands on network devices
author: NetWORKS

changes: Added command search functionality to quickly find commands
Added support for running custom commands directly from the UI
Implemented safety checks for non-show commands to prevent accidental configuration changes
Fixed credential manager issues with device groups and subnets
Added proper logger initialization to prevent UnboundLocalError
Fixed TypeError: unhashable type: 'dict' bug in subnet credential handling
Fixed device groups display in Command Manager
Improved group handling with more robust device group detection
Better error handling for different group structures
Support for running commands on network devices
